snippet.title: Usagito Watashi DEMO | Surreal RPG Maker Game
snippet.description:
Space school girls, psycho plush toys, and Earthbound style combat? Best game ever!

Usagito Watashi is a surreal game made in RPG Maker by Moga.

The game can be downloaded for free here: https://www.rpgmaker.net/games/9154/

Game description:
----------------------------------
This details the adventures of Reido (Who has a knack for hitting things and gadgetry) and Dr. Asagi(Who is a rabbit-doctor-thing???) as they wake up to a world under fire from all varieties of cosmic threat!
Experience the joys of space debris with a self destructive attitude, space stations long abandoned with stench of all the remnants of lives gone by, and also facing off with the immensity of the stars in classical famicom fashion.

Here are some words:
Vacations.
Tired.
Immense.
Save.
Game.
Cactus.
Download.
Brine.

Features:

Compulsory Menus!
Elitist Robots!
Strange Visitors!
Handcrafted Witchwave OST!
Eldritch Truth!
Classic RPG Combat!
The Vast Sea of Stars...
It’s a demo, so it’s going to have bugs- but that’s okay. Submit your reports, and I’ll fix, and update as soon as I can. Any bugs you find will be cataloged, and becomes a easter egg! #allbugsareeggs 
------------------------------------------------------

Outro music by Lethalix:
http://lethalix.newgrounds.com/
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpDjbfLZEVuwhwwRd9r0BGQ
